snippet: Malik Peters, a Brooklyn resident, was charged with second-degree murder in a shooting on Monday that left one teenager dead and another injured.
abstract: Teenager Malik Peters is charged with murder after shooting on Brooklyn street leaves 16-year-old Armani Hankins dead in what police say appears to be part of ongoing gang dispute.
lead_paragraph: Malik Peters, a Brooklyn resident, was charged with second-degree murder in a shooting on Monday that left one teenager dead and another injured.

headline.main: 17-Year-Old Is Charged With Murder in Downtown Brooklyn Shooting
